text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Maps treatment decision codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) TreatmentDirective2 v1.0 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/TreatmentDirective2-v1.0(2020EN) to <http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/consent-provision-type> as found in `Consent.provision.type` in FHIR R4.
